Description:
NoClassDefFound when generate report by genReport in BIRT runtime package.

Build number:2.2.0.v20070112

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using genReport in Report Engine folder inside BIRT RUNTIME package to generate attached report.

Expected result:
The report is rendered without errors.

Actual result:
Exception throws out.
